titleStmt.title: His Majesty at his first sitting in his Privy-Council, was graciously pleased to express himself in this manner: ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-prinred [sic] by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to his most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal coat of arms at head of text, with initials "J R" on either side.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
